items.text: another length ball, works it to the left of the square leg fielder this time for one
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: down the track, stays away on the leg side of the ball and hits it straight over long-off, 89 metres that one
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: flatter on middle and leg, defended
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: amzad: "Few years back, when Tamim was that much consistent, specially in WC2015, everybody was criticizing him and Board as well for keeping him in the squad, but Selectors keep faith on him and after that what a turn around by Tamim, i guess we is one of the best consistent openers across all the format . Soumya is a similar kind of player, even though not consistent, he also need some more time to expose himself..we need to keep some faith on him."
items.text: length outside off, big turn for Bishoo, Tamim waits for it before dabbing it towards short third man
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length, pushed off the back foot towards long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length, on middle and leg, helped towards backward square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: sharp turn once again from outside off, Tamim went back to glance it, misses and gets hit on the pads
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: a touch fuller this time, pushes it towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball, spinning on the pads, turned towards backward square leg once more
items.postText: Hasan Arif : "@Muzammil; Having all the respect to ur opinion I like to add that measuring Tamim in terms of averaging 30+ doesn't go with what actually he deserves.. Look @ his average in current years... It's not below 40-50 against all teams.... Actually his career average is lower bcoz of his early days batting average.... When he couldn't maintain his consistently...... But these days.... Matured Tamim....fabulous... World class. "
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of length, and keeping quite low, Soumya goes back and punches it towards long-on
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, a late cut towards short third man for one
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Jamal : "why why doesn't Devendra bishoo bowl googly, in an era where leg Spinners are bowling so many different variations..."
items.text: length, coming in with the angle, chopped towards covers
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length outside off, comes forward before leaving it
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length outside off and left alone once again
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length, on middle and off, goes back and punches it towards long-on
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length on middle and leg, punched towards long-on for one more
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, spinning on the pads, helped towards backward square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: moves across this time and picks it up from outside off and sweeps it over backward square leg this time, gets to his fifty with that four
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, doesn't turn much this time, defended
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, spinning on the pads, tucked away on the leg side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Sadman : "Totally agree with @Hasan arif. Tamim's recent 3-4 years average will be surely between 40-50. Should be 45+ IMO. " rijvyBD: "while we talk about our openers, it worth having a read on gem of an article by Isam on Javed Omar. Specially people who are in 30s like me will certainly have a travel back to their early cricket madness for the tigers. I was always a fan of Javed Omar Belim Golla. Here is the link " Allen now
items.text: fuller on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
items.postText: Zahid Hossain: "@Muzammil: interesting stats- Tamim against Bermuda, Canada and the Netherlands: 5 matches, 25 runs, average 5.00, strike rate 42.37 Tamim against Australia, England, Pakistan, South Africa, India, Srilanka, West Indies, New Zealand: 128 matches, 4197 runs, average 34.97, strike rate 79.14 "
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg, goes down on one knee and guides it towards fine leg
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, worked towards long-on
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Injury update from West Indies' twitter account: Both Shai Hope and Kemar Roach will play no further part in this 3rd ODI. Shai received a knock on his head in the last over of the match, he's been check by the doc and is being monitored. Roach's hamstring spasms are being monitored by the physio.
items.text: length around middle and leg, punched towards long-on for another easy single
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
